short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build your reading list, take notes, and share with your followers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 4later extension brings together your reading list, your notes, and your network of followers.

If you find yourself switching between the browser, your messgenger, and your favourite note taking tool to keep track of interesting pages, your notes on them, and sharing them with your friends and colleagues - 4later is for you.

You can bookmark the link using the extension. You can also add notes about the page. Finally, you can share it to your friends and followers in the community at 4later, who can read these in their feed on the extension (just like an RSS reader) or on the website.

For creators who publish curated newsletters, this is an interesting tool to also showcase the many, many links they go through to curate that final product.
